document_data.name: High Holy House of Coin
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2024-1-6 - Andred Kuroone, Lurandural Veltree, Jhalanavress Tanthavur, and Orstrar Galannavruk}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''The High Holy House of Coin''''' was a temple dedicated to [[Waukeen]], the Lady of Trade, built in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] in the city of [[Scornubel]].
document_data.Location: The High Holy House of Coin stood in the northeasternmost side of Scornubel. The temple's rear wing hid the temple yard, framed by the stables on the yard's other side.
document_data.Activities: The High Holy House of Coin's daily operations were headed by the Preceptress. [[Priestess]] [[Jhalanavress Tanthavur]] held the rank in the late 15{{th}} century DR. She ensured the building, its piping, walls, good, all were in good shape, supervised the temple's lay staff and underpriests, as well as purchased goods and supplies, including [[thael leaf]] to be mixed with [[pipeweed]] by the clergy and added to the temple's [[incense]].
document_data.History: The High Holy House of Coin was successfully financed and constructed in the late 1490s DR.
